Ok, let me list the things this program does not do:

1)does not check for correct version number when opening a file
2)provide documentation
3)convert anything back into a scenario file.

Why did I bother publishing, if it is not complete:

The main reason was evaluation of the format for the way the program 
interprets information.  This program shoots two different different 
kinds of files:

1)a file exactly like the existing scenario converter
2)a file that tries to make all that data meaningfull.

Converting the 1st type of file back into scenario file will be 
exceptionally easy.  I'll have to provide documentation to make the 
2nd type work.
